products.title: Nissan Navara D40 2005-2015 Manual Roller Shutter
products.body_html:
Designed for a perfect fit and built to handle tough conditions, our roller shutter offers a secure, stylish, and practical protection for your truck bed—whether you're on the job or off the grid.

  • Custom fit for Nissan Navara D40 2005-2015 models– Precision-engineered to perfectly match the dimensions and design of your Navara.
  • Durable aluminium construction – Made from high-quality aluminium slats for maximum strength, durability, and long-lasting performance.
  • Matte black finish – Stylish black coating adds a rugged, premium look to your pickup truck.
  • Weather-resistant protection – Shields your cargo from rain, dust, and debris. Also includes a built-in drainage system to help redirect water away. (Note: Please see notes regarding water ingress and tonneau covers below.)
  • Lockable design – Built-in locking system keeps your gear safe and secure on the go.
  • Controlled retraction mechanism – Adjustable speed control allows you to manage how quickly the shutter retracts for safer operation.
  • Integrated T-Slot Side Channels - The side rails include a built-in slat that allows the use of T-bolts - perfect for mounting accessories like cross bar brackets, tie-downs, or other rack attachments.

Suitable for the Nissan Navara D40 2005-2015 models only.

Please note that we cannot guarantee an absolutely watertight outcome with this product. Based on our experience—and feedback widely shared by owners of similar products—tonneau covers from all major suppliers offer varying levels of protection from water ingress. In our knowledge, proper installation plays the most critical role in water resistance. Because installation is outside of our control, we want to clearly state that a completely water-free result cannot be guaranteed. We suggest this for all brands of similar tonneau type products.

products.title: Nissan Navara 2015-2023 NP300 Carpet Load Bed Liner
products.body_html:
Nissan Navara 2015-2023 NP300 Carpet Load Bed Liner

Please note – You must have the original high sided plastic bed liner installed for this trunk liner to fit.

Premium Materials

Our custom trunk liners are precision-crafted carpet mats with a non-slip backing, offering exceptional durability. Designed to keep items securely in place in your pickup bed, they’re also an excellent choice for pet owners.

Custom Tailored

In addition to being durable and highly protective, our trunk liners are also tailored to fit your vehicle exactly - providing precise coverage. Every tailored trunk liner is simple to attach and full instructions are provided.

Trunk liner key features:

Premium materials – Heavy duty carpet with non-slip backing
Easy to fit
Fully tailored
Anti-slip
Washable
Heavy-duty

Parts included:

1 x Custom Trunk Liner

products.title: Volkswagen Amarok 2010-2022 Double Cab Cotton-Backed PU Seat Covers
products.body_html:
Volkswagen Amarok 2010-2022 Double Cab Cotton-Backed PU Seat Covers

Premium Materials

Our full range of cotton-backed tailored seat covers are made from a superior 600 denier cotton-backed polyester, enhanced with a waterproof polyurethane coating. 

Custom Tailored

In addition to being durable and highly protective, the seat covers are also tailored to fit your vehicle's seats exactly - providing a snug and precise coverage that stays in place, seamlessly integrating with the contours of your seats.

Thoroughly Tested

The materials used are rigorously tested under laboratory conditions to ensure full protection of your original seats from the elements. Using the latest technologies, these seat covers are designed not just to protect your seats but also to provide an ultra-smart look to the vehicle interior.

Seat Covers key features:

Premium materials – 600 denier cotton backed polyester 
Easy to fit
Fully tailored
Waterproof (PU700mm HH)
Washable
Flame retardant
SGS rub tested to 100,000 rubs

Parts included:

Front

1 x Single Drivers Custom Seat Cover
1 x Passenger Custom Seat Cover
1 x Custom Armrest Cover
2 x Front Custom Headrest Covers

Rear

1 x Rear Custom Bench Seat Cover
3 x Rear Custom Headrest Covers

products.title: Nissan Navara D40 2005-2010 Bonnet Guard Stone Deflector/Protector
products.body_html:
Make your Navara stand out from the crowd with one of our premium acrylic black bonnet guards.  As well as looking great it will also help to protect your bonnet and screen from unwanted bugs and stones.

  • Easy to fit, no specialist knowledge or tools required (please ask and we can include some fitting instructions)
  •  All fitting brackets included and already assembled
  • High quality acrylic, not injection moulded, these are durable and can bend and flex rather than snap and break
  • Does not rust, does not fade
  • Aerodynamic and unique design
  • Scratch resistant

This is for the facelift Nissan Navara D40 2005-2010 models only.

products.title: Mitsubishi L200 2015-2021 AQM T80 Heavy Duty Steel Canopy & T40 Roof Rack
products.body_html:
Get the full setup with the heavy-duty AQM T80 Rear Canopy, coated in rugged Line-X, and the perfectly paired T40 Roof Rack—built to bolt on and get to work.

Heavy-Duty Steel AQM T80 Rear Canopy with Line-X Coating 

Upgrade your pick-up truck with this premium AQM T80 steel rear canopy, engineered for ultimate durability, security, and functionality. Designed to handle the demands of both commercial and leisure use, this canopy is finished with a high-quality Line-X coating—providing unmatched protection against the elements and a sleek, rugged look that lasts.

  •  Robust Steel Construction: Built tough for high load capacity
  •  Line-X Protective Coating: Durable, hard-wearing, and waterproof—resistant to scratches, dents, and corrosion while maintaining an attractive textured finish.
  •  Weatherproof Design: Keeps your gear dry and secure in all weather conditions.
  •  Multi-Side Access: Access doors on both sides and the rear make loading and unloading fast and efficient. Each door features dual hydraulic struts for smooth operation.
  •  Enhanced Security: Solid access doors with no windows and dual locks on each provide excellent protection for your tools, gear, or valuables.
  •  Full-Length Roof Rails: Built-in roof rails give you additional loading versatility for ladders, cargo racks, or adventure gear.

Whether you're on the job site or heading off the grid, this steel rear canopy offers the strength, utility, and security you need—wrapped in a high-performance Line-X finish that stands up to anything you throw at it.

Heavy Duty T40 Roof Rack For AQM T80 Canopy

Specifically designed for the AQM T80 canopy, the T40 Roof Rack is a sleek and functional upgrade for your truck—offering strength, versatility, and style without the need for modifications.

  • Precision Fit: Engineered exclusively for the AQM T80 Canopy—no adjustments or drilling to your vehicle required.
  • Lightweight & Rust-Resistant: Constructed from high-quality aluminium for excellent corrosion resistance and easier handling, without compromising on durability.
  • Rugged Finish: Finished in a tough matte black coating for a clean, durable look.
  • Accessory-Ready: Mounting points for lights and other gear.
  • Certified Quality: TÜV certified for safety and reliability.

Please note: This roof rack is only compatible with the AQM T80 canopy.

This canopy is suitable for the 2015-2021 (MK5 & MK6) double cab Mitsubishi L200. If you are unsure on your truck's model year, please get in touch before purchasing.
